thread.title: Rihanna takes boyfriend to meet mother?
thread.title_full: Rihanna takes boyfriend to meet mother? - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Rihanna takes boyfriend to meet mother?
text:
Singer Rihanna is reportedly taking rumoured boyfriend Travis Scott to the Caribbean to introduce him to her family including mother Monica Braithwaite.
READ: â€‹ Rihanna to introduce beau to mom
The 27-year-old 'Where Have You Been' hitmaker is planning to make Scott meet her relatives, only a month after she did the same with former boyfriend Lewis Hamilton, reported Female First.
For latest Music Music
"Rihanna has fallen hard for him. It's completely different to her romance with Lewis, as she was never fully serious about him. Her friends think this is already her most committed relationship since Chris Brown.
 Music Music
"But the ultimate test for Travis will be meeting the tough-talking matriarch of the family, her mom Monica Braithwaite, who is fiercely protective over her daughter," a source said.
Listen to Rihanna on Gaana.com
The pair were recently spotted enjoying a date night in the city of love, Paris, France.
